alert.note: Alert for Central Columbia River Gorge; Upper Hood River Valley; Western Columbia River Gorge (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 30 at 8:57AM PST until December 30 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 25 mph. * WHERE...In Washington, Western Columbia River Gorge and Central Columbia River Gorge. In Oregon, Upper Hood River Valley, Western Columbia River Gorge and Central Columbia River Gorge. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Central Columbia River Gorge; Upper Hood River Valley; Western Columbia River Gorge
